## Acquisition Metrics

Measure how people discover and start using your product.  
**Examples:**

- **Traffic / Visits** (organic, paid, referral)
- **Sign-ups or New Accounts**
- **Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)**
- **Activation Rate** (percentage of new users who reach a key first milestone)

## Engagement Metrics

Track how actively and frequently people interact with your product.  
**Examples:**

- **Daily / Weekly / Monthly Active Users (DAU, WAU, MAU)**
- **Session length & frequency**
- **Feature usage rates**
- **Engagement depth** (e.g., number of actions per session)

## Retention Metrics

Measure how well your product keeps users coming back over time.  
**Examples:**

- **Retention rate / Churn rate**
- **Cohort analysis** (retention curves)
- **Repeat usage patterns**
- **Time to churn**

## Monetization Metrics

Reflect your ability to generate revenue from your product.  
**Examples:**

- **Average Revenue per Customer (ARPC)**
- **Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)**
- **Conversion rate** from free to paid
- **Gross margin** (percentage of revenue left after covering the direct costs of delivering your product or service)
- **Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR)**

## Customer Satisfaction & Quality Metrics

Track how users feel about your product and the quality of their experience.  
**Examples:**

- **Net Promoter Score (NPS)**
- **Customer Satisfaction Score (CSAT)**
- **Customer Effort Score (CES)**
- **Bug reports & defect rates**

## Business & Strategic Impact Metrics

Link product performance to broader business goals.  
**Examples:**

- **Market share growth**
- **Revenue contribution by product line**
- **Product ROI**
- **Adoption in target segments**
